channel.title: Transfer Learning on
channel.description: Recent content in Transfer Learning on

item.title: Fine-Tuning LLMs - Customizing Language Models
item.description: Pretrained LLMs are generalists. Fine-tuning makes them specialists. Adapt to your domain, your style, your task.

item.title: BERT - Bidirectional Language Understanding
item.description: Before BERT: train models from scratch for each task. After BERT: pretrain once, fine-tune everywhere.
